bomberman.core.logic
Interface MoveStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
Strategy1, Strategy2
public interface MoveStrategy

The MoveStrategy interface provides base methods to define the class of autonomous movement strategies for Enemy and DynamicPhysicsEntity instances.

Author:
Federico Scozzafava
See Also:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strategy_pattern

Method Summary
 void changeDirection()
          Change the current direction.
 void move()
          Called at every update moves the DynamicPhysicsEntity in the current direction.
 MoveStrategy setEntity(DynamicPhysicsEntity entity)
          Sets the DynamicPhysicsEntity to move.
